related_post.text: Hi everyone! Who's up for a challenge? (it's not :p) I'm looking for the most elegant way to convert a float with 2 precisions in an int. eg: `10 => 1000 / 10.5 = 1050 / 10.1234 = 1012 (notice the 34 being skipped)`. It is required to use a payment API provider I'm currently using

comments: Jak has question and Maddyson provides SO post answer
